message.entry: Spectrum type must be one of 'Jakes', 'Flat', 'Rounded', 'Bell', 'Asymmetric Jakes', 'Restricted Jakes', 'Gaussian' and 'BiGaussian'.
The normalized minimum frequency must be no larger than the normalized maximum frequency.
Specify the field and corresponding value in pairs for bi-Gaussian spectrum type.
The field must be one of 'NormalizedStandardDeviations', 'NormalizedCenterFrequencies' and 'PowerGains' for bi-Gaussian spectrum type.
At least one power gain must be non-zero.
A Doppler spectrum structure must have a SpectrumType field.
SpectrumType is the only field for a Jakes Doppler spectrum structure.
SpectrumType is the only field for a flat Doppler spectrum structure.
Polynomial is the only field other than SpectrumType for a rounded Doppler spectrum structure.
Coefficient is the only field other than SpectrumType for a bell Doppler spectrum structure.
NormalizedFrequencyInterval is the only field other than SpectrumType for an asymmetric Jakes Doppler spectrum structure.
NormalizedFrequencyInterval is the only field other than SpectrumType for a restricted Jakes Doppler spectrum structure.
NormalizedStandardDeviation is the only field other than SpectrumType for a Gaussian Doppler spectrum structure.
NormalizedStandardDeviations, NormalizedCenterFrequencies and PowerGains are the other three fields than SpectrumType for a bi-Gaussian Doppler spectrum structure.
